about_the_game:
As Kya you will explore a land where many popular and less known books are dispersed all over, some in harder to reach places. However Kya will be able to progress, reach those spots and collect the books by using a typing mechanic that adds an educational factor to Kya's exploration experience in the game.

Kya will dispose of the enemies that block her path, open chests and acquire knowledge orbs as well as other interesting collectibles.


As a player you will find trivia owls perched on columns where you can test your general knowledge about stories and fables from around the world.


Improve your scores and statistics as you explore, collect books that you may have heard of in your childhood, face enemies and answer correctly to trivia questions! It's a mix between casual exploration, puzzles, trivia and platforming that will strive to reward the player at every corner of this experience that is Land of Tales.

short_description: Land of Tales is an atmospheric 3D platformer with typing mechanics in which you play as Kya, a young girl who is teleported to a world where story books are scattered throughout. As Kya explores and progresses through the world, she will discover the reason for her presence there.
